entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
